questions.text: Which of the following best illustrates impersonation on social media platforms?
options: Creating a fan page with the name and photo of a celebrity and clearly stating it's unofficial.
Logging into your own account from a different device.
Creating a fake account using someone else's name, photos, and bio to mislead others.
Using filters and effects to change your appearance in a video.
questions.correctAnswer: Creating a fake account using someone else's name, photos, and bio to mislead others.

questions.correctAnswer: Klout score is influenced by twitter indegree

questions.text: Which of the following statements are true for Link Farmers?
options: Top Link farmers have high indegree as compared to Spammers
Top Link farmers have lower indegree as compared to Spammers
Node indegree of Link Farmers are the same as any Random samples
Node indegree of Link Farmers are higher than any Random samples
questions.correctAnswer: Top Link farmers have high indegree as compared to Spammers
